sqlMap.select: SELECT XIU_ITEM_ID xiuItemId, XIU_ATTR_VALUES xiuAttrValues, XIU_ATTR_VALUES_ZH xiuAttrValuesZh, jd_Ware_Id jdWareId, XIU_BRAND_CODE xiuBrandCode, JD_BRAND_ID jdBrandId, xiucode xiucode, title title, high high, weight weight, lenght lenght, costprice costprice, marketprice marketprice, jdprice jdprice, notes notes, mainimagepath mainimagepath, stocknum stocknum, operatename operatename, num num, brandcode brandcode, categoryid categoryid, globalflag globalFlag FROM xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info WHERE jd_Ware_Id=#jdWareId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info ( xiucode, title, high, weight, lenght, attributes, wide, costprice, marketprice, jdprice, mainimagepath, stocknum, operatename, num, brandcode, categoryid, cid, createDate, lastupdate, jd_ware_id, xiu_item_id, xiu_brand_code, status, onLineStatus, shopcategory, supplierCode, notes, adContent, itemNum, globalflag ) values( #xiucode#, #title#, #high#, #weight#, #lenght#, #attributes#, #wide#, #costprice#, #marketprice#, #jdprice#, #mainimagepath#, #stocknum#, #operatename#, #num#, #brandcode#, #categoryid#, #cid#, #createDate#, #lastupdate#, #jd_ware_id#, #xiu_item_id#, #xiu_brand_code#, #status#, #onLineStatus#, #shopCategory#, #supplierCode#, #notes#, #adContent#, #itemNum# #globalFlag# )

insert into xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info ( xiucode, title, high, weight, lenght, attributes, wide, costprice, marketprice, jdprice, mainimagepath, stocknum, operatename, num, brandcode, categoryid, cid, createDate, lastupdate, jd_ware_id, xiu_item_id, xiu_brand_code, status, onLineStatus, shopcategory, supplierCode, notes, globalflag ) values( #xiucode#, #title#, #high#, #weight#, #lenght#, #attributes#, #wide#, #costprice#, #marketprice#, #jdprice#, #mainimagepath#, #stocknum#, #operatename#, #num#, #brandcode#, #categoryid#, #cid#, #createDate#, #lastupdate#, #jd_ware_id#, #xiu_item_id#, #xiu_brand_code#, #status#, #onLineStatus#, #shopCategory#, #supplierCode#, #notes#, #globalFlag# )

insert into xiu_jd.jd_product_info ( xiucode, title, high, weight, lenght, attributes, wide, costprice, marketprice, jdprice, mainimagepath, stocknum, operatename, num, brandcode, categoryid, cid, createDate, lastupdate, jd_ware_id, xiu_item_id, xiu_brand_code, status, onLineStatus, shopcategory, supplierCode, notes ) values( #xiucode#, #title#, #high#, #weight#, #lenght#, #attributes#, #wide#, #costprice#, #marketprice#, #jdprice#, #mainimagepath#, #stocknum#, #operatename#, #num#, #brandcode#, #categoryid#, #cid#, #createDate#, #lastupdate#, #jd_ware_id#, #xiu_item_id#, #xiu_brand_code#, #status#, #onLineStatus#, #shopCategory#, #supplierCode#, #notes# )

insert into xiu_ebay_jd.jd_product_info ( xiucode, title, high, weight, lenght, attributes, wide, costprice, marketprice, jdprice, mainimagepath, stocknum, operatename, num, brandcode, categoryid, cid, createDate, lastupdate, jd_ware_id, xiu_item_id, xiu_brand_code, status, onLineStatus, shopcategory, supplierCode, notes ) values( #xiucode#, #title#, #high#, #weight#, #lenght#, #attributes#, #wide#, #costprice#, #marketprice#, #jdprice#, #mainimagepath#, #stocknum#, #operatename#, #num#, #brandcode#, #categoryid#, #cid#, #createDate#, #lastupdate#, #jd_ware_id#, #xiu_item_id#, #xiu_brand_code#, #status#, #onLineStatus#, #shopCategory#, #supplierCode#, #notes# )
sqlMap.delete:
delete from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t where t.xiucode in
#value[]#
sqlMap.select:
select t.jd_ware_id wardId, t.xiucode xiucode
from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t
#xiuCodes[]#

select t.jd_ware_id jdWareId, t.xiucode xiucode, t.title title
from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t
#jdWardIds[]#

select ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_SN, ATTR_ID, ATTR_NAME, VAL_ID, VAL_DESC, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from xiu_goods.X_DATA_PRD_ATTR where 1=1 and PRODUCT_SN in
#value[]#
and DISPLAY = '1' and DELETE_FLAG='0'
sqlMap.update:
update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t
t.onlinestatus=#onlineStatus#
t.stocknum=#stockNum#
t.shopcategory=#shopCategory#
t.supplierCode=#supplierCode#
t.costprice=#costprice#
t.lockuser=#lockUser#
where t.jd_ware_id=#JdwareId#

update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t
t.onlinestatus=#onLineStatus#
t.stocknum=#stocknum#
t.shopcategory=#shopCategory#
t.supplierCode=#supplierCode#
t.costprice=#costprice#
where t.jd_ware_id=#jdWareId#
update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t set t.lockuser=#lockuser# where t.xiucode=#xiucode# and t.lockuser is null
update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t set t.lockuser='' where t.xiucode=#xiucode#
sqlMap.delete: delete from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t where t.jd_ware_id=#wareId#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t where t.xiucode =#xiucode#
select count(*) from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t where t.jd_ware_id=#wareId#
select count(*) from xiu_jd_bag.jd_attribute t left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info w on t.cid = w.cid where t.name='品牌' and w.xiucode=#xiucode#

select n.title title, n.stocknum stocknum, n.operatename operatename from (select m.*, rownum rn from (
select t.*, row_number() over(partition by t.xiucode order by t.createdate desc) as rown from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t ) m where m.rown = 1 and rownum <= #lastNum#) n where rn >= #firstNum# order by n.createdate desc

select n.title title, n.high high, n.weight weight, n.lenght lenght, n.costprice costprice, n.marketprice marketprice, n.jdprice jdprice, n.notes notes, n.mainimagepath mainimagepath, n.stocknum stocknum, n.attributes attributes, n.createdate createdate, n.xiucode xiucode, n.lastupdate lastupdate, n.operatename operatename, n.num num, n.brandcode brandcode, n.categoryid categoryid, n.status status, n.wide wide, n.cid cid, n.lockuser lockuser, n.jdWareId jdWareId, n.shopCategory shopCategory, n.jdBrandName jdBrandName, n.jdBrandAid jdBrandAid, n.jdBrandVid jdBrandVid, n.itemnum itemNum, n.adcontent adcontent, n.globalflag globalFlag
from (
select
t.title title, t.high high, t.weight weight, t.lenght lenght, t.costprice costprice, t.marketprice marketprice, t.jdprice jdprice, t.notes notes, t.mainimagepath mainimagepath, t.stocknum stocknum, t.attributes attributes, t.createdate createdate, t.xiucode xiucode, t.lastupdate lastupdate, t.operatename operatename, t.num num, t.brandcode brandcode, t.categoryid categoryid, t.status status, t.wide wide, t.cid cid, t.lockuser lockuser, t.jd_ware_id jdWareId, t.itemnum itemNum, t.adcontent adcontent, t.shopCategory shopCategory, m.jd_vame jdBrandName, jd.aid jdBrandAid, jd.vid jdBrandVid, t.globalflag globalFlag from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t
left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_brand m on t.brandcode = m.xiu_brand_code and t.cid = m.jd_Cid left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_attributevalue jd on m.jd_vid = jd.vid
where 1 = 1
t.xiucode =#xiucode#
t.num =#num#
order by t.createdate desc) n where n.jdBrandAid = (
select a.aid from xiu_jd_bag.jd_attribute a where a.cid = ( select e.cid as cid from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info e where 1=1
e.xiucode =#xiucode#
) and a.name = '品牌'
) and rownum = 1

select n.title title, n.high high, n.weight weight, n.lenght lenght, n.costprice costprice, n.marketprice marketprice, n.jdprice jdprice, n.notes notes, n.mainimagepath mainimagepath, n.stocknum stocknum, n.attributes attributes, n.createdate createdate, n.xiucode xiucode, n.lastupdate lastupdate, n.operatename operatename, n.num num, n.brandcode brandcode, n.categoryid categoryid, n.status status, n.wide wide, n.cid cid, n.lockuser lockuser, n.jdWareId jdWareId, n.shopCategory shopCategory, n.jdBrandName jdBrandName, n.jdBrandAid jdBrandAid, n.jdBrandVid jdBrandVid, n.itemnum itemNum, n.adcontent adcontent
from (
select
t.title title, t.high high, t.weight weight, t.lenght lenght, t.costprice costprice, t.marketprice marketprice, t.jdprice jdprice, t.notes notes, t.mainimagepath mainimagepath, t.stocknum stocknum, t.attributes attributes, t.createdate createdate, t.xiucode xiucode, t.lastupdate lastupdate, t.operatename operatename, t.num num, t.brandcode brandcode, t.categoryid categoryid, t.status status, t.wide wide, t.cid cid, t.lockuser lockuser, t.jd_ware_id jdWareId, t.itemnum itemNum, t.adcontent adcontent, t.shopCategory shopCategory, m.jd_vame jdBrandName, jd.aid jdBrandAid, jd.vid jdBrandVid from xiu_jd.jd_product_info t
left join xiu_jd.jd_xiu_brand m on t.brandcode = m.xiu_brand_code and t.cid = m.jd_Cid left join xiu_jd.jd_attributevalue jd on m.jd_vid = jd.vid
where 1 = 1
t.xiucode =#xiucode#
t.num =#num#
order by t.createdate desc) n where n.jdBrandAid = (
select a.aid from xiu_jd.jd_attribute a where a.cid = ( select e.cid as cid from xiu_jd.jd_product_info e where 1=1
e.xiucode =#xiucode#
) and a.name = '品牌'
) and rownum = 1

select n.title title, n.high high, n.weight weight, n.lenght lenght, n.costprice costprice, n.marketprice marketprice, n.jdprice jdprice, n.notes notes, n.mainimagepath mainimagepath, n.stocknum stocknum, n.attributes attributes, n.createdate createdate, n.xiucode xiucode, n.lastupdate lastupdate, n.operatename operatename, n.num num, n.brandcode brandcode, n.categoryid categoryid, n.status status, n.wide wide, n.cid cid, n.lockuser lockuser, n.jdWareId jdWareId, n.shopCategory shopCategory, n.jdBrandName jdBrandName, n.jdBrandAid jdBrandAid, n.jdBrandVid jdBrandVid, n.itemnum itemNum, n.adcontent adcontent
from (
select
t.title title, t.high high, t.weight weight, t.lenght lenght, t.costprice costprice, t.marketprice marketprice, t.jdprice jdprice, t.notes notes, t.mainimagepath mainimagepath, t.stocknum stocknum, t.attributes attributes, t.createdate createdate, t.xiucode xiucode, t.lastupdate lastupdate, t.operatename operatename, t.num num, t.brandcode brandcode, t.categoryid categoryid, t.status status, t.wide wide, t.cid cid, t.lockuser lockuser, t.jd_ware_id jdWareId, t.itemnum itemNum, t.adcontent adcontent, t.shopCategory shopCategory, m.jd_vame jdBrandName, jd.aid jdBrandAid, jd.vid jdBrandVid from xiu_ebay_jd.jd_product_info t
left join xiu_ebay_jd.jd_xiu_brand m on t.brandcode = m.xiu_brand_code and t.cid = m.jd_Cid left join xiu_ebay_jd.jd_attributevalue jd on m.jd_vid = jd.vid
where 1 = 1
t.xiucode =#xiucode#
t.num =#num#
order by t.createdate desc) n where n.jdBrandAid = (
select a.aid from xiu_ebay_jd.jd_attribute a where a.cid = ( select e.cid as cid from xiu_ebay_jd.jd_product_info e where 1=1
e.xiucode =#xiucode#
) and a.name = '品牌'
) and rownum = 1

select t.title title, t.high high, t.weight weight, t.lenght lenght, t.costprice costprice, t.marketprice marketprice, t.jdprice jdprice, t.notes notes, t.mainimagepath mainimagepath, t.stocknum stocknum, t.attributes attributes, t.createdate createdate, t.xiucode xiucode, t.lastupdate lastupdate, t.operatename operatename, t.num num, t.brandcode brandcode, t.categoryid categoryid, t.status status, t.wide wide, w.jd_cid cid, t.lockuser lockuser, t.jd_ware_id jdWareId, t.shopCategory shopCategory, m.jd_vame jdBrandName, jd.aid jdBrandAid, jd.vid jdBrandVid from jd_product_info t left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_category w on substr(t.categoryid,1,4) = w.xiu_cid left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_brand m on t.brandcode = m.xiu_brand_code and t.cid = m.jd_Cid left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_attributevalue jd on m.jd_vid = jd.vid where 1=1
t.xiucode =#xiucode#
t.num =#num#
and rownum = 1 order by t.createdate desc
select jd_cid from xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_category t where t.xiu_cid = #xiuCid#
sqlMap.update: update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t set t.jdprice=#jdprice# where t.xiucode=#xiucode#
sqlMap.select: select t.jdprice jdprice, t.marketprice marketprice from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t where t.xiucode=#entityId#

t.lockuser = #lockuser#

t.onlinestatus=#onLineStatus#
t.adContent=#adContent#
t.marketprice=#marketprice#
t.itemNum=#itemNum#
t.shopCategory=#shopCategory#
t.stocknum=#stocknum#
where t.xiucode = #xiucode#

t.status = #status#

t.onlinestatus=#onLineStatus#
t.adContent=#adContent#
t.marketprice=#marketprice#
t.itemNum=#itemNum#
t.shopCategory=#shopCategory#

select t.jd_cid from xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_category t where t.xiu_cid= #xiuCategoryID# and rownum =1

t.title = #title#
t.notes=#notes#
t.adContent=#adContent#
t.itemNum=#itemNum#
t.jdprice=#jdprice#
t.marketprice=#marketprice#
t.shopCategory=#shopCategory#
where t.jd_ware_id = #jdWareId#

t.onlinestatus=#onLineStatus#
where t.jd_ware_id = #jdWareId#
sqlMap.select: select t.cid cid, c.jd_fullname mainimagepath, t.categoryid categoryid, b.xiu_brand_code xiu_brand_code, b.xiu_brand_name jdBrandName, t.brandcode brandcode from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_category c on t.cid = c.jd_cid left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_brand b on t.brandcode = b.xiu_brand_code where t.xiucode = #xiuCode# and rownum = 1

select t.cid cid, c.jd_fullname mainimagepath, t.categoryid categoryid, b.xiu_brand_code xiu_brand_code, b.xiu_brand_name jdBrandName, t.brandcode brandcode from xiu_jd.jd_product_info t left join xiu_jd.jd_xiu_category c on t.cid = c.jd_cid left join xiu_jd.jd_xiu_brand b on t.brandcode = b.xiu_brand_code where t.xiucode = #xiuCode# and rownum = 1

select t.cid cid, c.jd_fullname mainimagepath, t.categoryid categoryid, b.xiu_brand_code xiu_brand_code, b.xiu_brand_name jdBrandName, t.brandcode brandcode from xiu_ebay_jd.jd_product_info t left join xiu_ebay_jd.jd_xiu_category c on t.cid = c.jd_cid left join xiu_ebay_jd.jd_xiu_brand b on t.brandcode = b.xiu_brand_code where t.xiucode = #xiuCode# and rownum = 1
select sum(t.stocknum) from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where t.jdwarejd=#wareId#
select sum(t.stocknum) from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where t.xiucode=#xiuCode# and t.jdwarejd is null
select content from xiu_jd.jd_adcontent where rownum=1
